'''Liam Burke '''is an Irish actor, best known for playing Mr. Boaz in ''[[wikipedia: City of Ember| City of Ember]]'' alongside [[wikipedia: Saoirse Ronan|Saoirse Ronan]]. In ''Game of Thrones'' he was cast as [[Aerys II Targaryen]] in a flashback, but the scene was cut for time and pacing.
